sense.def:
A bill
je pisna izjava o denarju, ki ga dolgujemo za blago ali usluge.

A bill
je tudi kos papirnatega denarja;

V parlamentu je
a bill
uradni opis predlaganega novega zakona, o katerem parlament razpravlja in potem glasuje.

seg.quote: The Bill was defeated by 238 votes to 145.

sense.def:
The bill of a show or concert
so ljudje, ki bodo nastopili v predstavi ali na koncertu, ali zabavne točke, iz katerih je sestavljena predstava ali koncert.

seg.quote: There were some famous names on the bill.
The Chamber Opera is offering a double bill of Mozart and Haydn.

sense.def:
Kadar so nastopajoči ali predstava
billed as a particular thing
, jih kot take napovedujejo.

seg.quote: ...what was being billed as the greatest show on earth.

sense.def:
A bird's bill
je ptičji kljun.
